document.full_text: blues musician lacy gibson, whose jazz-influenced guitar and rich vocals were sought after by leaders of chicago's once-thriving blues scene, has died at age 74, one of his record labels said on tuesday.
document.title: chicago blues musician lacy gibson dead at 74
lines_and_colors: blues musician lacy gibson, whose jazz-influenced guitar and rich vocals were sought after by leaders of chicago's once-thriving blues scene, has died at age 74, one of his record labels said on tuesday.
